title: Louis Comfort Tiffany: Masterworks
description:
A gorgeous new edition with the cover printed on silver. Tiffany was highly skilled in jewelry design, ceramics, enamels, and metalwork but he is best known for his beautiful stained-glass designs. Using opalescent glass in a variety of colors and textures, he created a stunning range of jewel-like Art Nouveau works, many of them presented here in this luxurious volume.

  • Hardcover
  • Dimensions: 11.50 x 11.10 in.
  • Pages: 200
